history.proof: intros Hf Hg. destruct Hf as [lf Hlf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hlg]. exists (fun x => lg (lf x)). shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
W: NormedModule K
V: NormedModule K
U: NormedModule K
F: (U -> Prop) -> Prop
FF: Filter F
f: U -> V
g: V -> W

Goal:
ex_filterdiff f F -> ex_filterdiff g (filtermap f F) -> ex_filterdiff (fun y : U => g (f y)) F

Premises:
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
ex_filterdiff = fun (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => exists l : U -> V, filterdiff f F l : forall (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K), (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments K, U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope function_scope]
ex_filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (H1 : ex_filterdiff f F) => match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g F l0) l (filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H H0 Hl) end : forall (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> forall f g : U -> V, F (fun y : U => f y = g y) ->...-> ex_filterdiff g F Arguments K, U, V, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _]

ex_filterdiff_ext_locally = fun (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (H : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H0 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g (locally x) l0) l (filterdiff_ext_locally f g x l H Hl) end : forall (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (f g : U -> V) (x : U), locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff g (locally x) Arguments K, U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope function_scope _ _ _]
ex_filterdiff_locally = fun (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (f : U -> V) (x : U) (Fx : is_filter_lim F x) (H : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ l Df => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff f F l0) l (filterdiff_locally f x l Fx Df) end : forall (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> forall (f : U -> V) (x : U), is_filter_lim F x -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff f F Arguments K, U, V, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _]

norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- NormedModule ?K]
filtermap_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> Filter (filtermap f F)
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- Filter ?F]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- Filter ?F]
norm_triangle_inv : forall x y : ?V, Rabs (norm x - norm y) <= norm (minus x y) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K W : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : V -> W |- NormedModule ?K]

```coq
intros Hf Hg. destruct Hf as [lf Hlf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hlg].
exists (fun x => lg (lf x)).
apply ex_filterdiff_ext_loc with (fun y => g (f y)) lf lg.
- intros x Hlim. apply filterlim_comp_2 with (f (f x)) (fun y => g (f y)) g.
  + apply filterlim_filter_le_1 with F.
    * apply domin_rw_r with f; assumption.
    * apply Hlf.
  + apply filterlim_filter_le_1 with (filtermap f F).
    * apply is_filter_lim_filtermap with (f x).
      apply filterlim_comp_2 with f id (fun y => g (f y)); try apply Hlf.
      intros. reflexivity.
      intros. apply Hlg. apply Hlim.
    * apply Hlg.
- apply Hlf.
Qed.
